column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Roasted dates with bacon & apple vinaigrette ($6) ---Where to start with this plate. Okay
column2: lets go with the one word : SPECTACULAR. I'm not particularly attracted to dates or bacon (I know I know
column4: but this dish was an explosion of delicious. A good flavour balance from the honey sweetened dates
column6: and refreshing tart apples. My friend John quotes: "Worth giving up your first-born child for. THEY ARE THAT GOOD." I'll let you decide how much of that statement is exaggeration and truth.
